Collection.LongName: AMSR-E/AMSR2 Unified L2B Half-Orbit 25 km EASE-Grid Surface Soil Moisture
Collection.DataSetId: AMSR-E/AMSR2 Unified L2B Half-Orbit 25 km EASE-Grid Surface Soil Moisture V001
Collection.Description: The AMSR-E/AMSR2 Unified Level-2B land product includes surface soil moisture estimates derived using the Normalized Polarization Difference algorithm (NPD) and the Single Channel Algorithm (SCA) along with ancillary information gridded to the 25 km Equal-Area Scalable Earth Grid (EASE-Grid).
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Geophysical Quantities at the sensor resolution or geolocated
Collection.VersionDescription: The first version of the AMSR-E/AMSR2 Unified dataset includes an updated Normalized Polarization Difference (NPD) algorithm and the first standard Single Channel Algorithm (SCA) algorithm.
Collection.CitationForExternalPublication: Jackson, T., S. Chan, R. Bindlish, and E. Njoku. 2016. AMSR-E/AMSR2 Unified L2B Half-Orbit 25 km EASE-Grid Surface Soil Moisture, Version 1. [Indicate subset used]. Boulder, Colorado USA. NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center. doi: http://dx.doi.org/10.5067/IKQ0G7ODMLC7.
Collection.RestrictionComment: As a condition of using these data, you must cite the use of this data set using the recommended citation. For more information, see our Use and Copyright Web page at http://nsidc.org/about/use_copyright.html.

Address.StreetAddress: M/S 300-362A, Jet Propulsion Laboratory, 4800 Oak Grove Drive

Contact.HoursOfService: 9:00 A.M. to 5:00 P.M., U.S. Mountain Time, Monday through Friday, excluding U.S. holidays.
Contact.OrganizationName: NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center (NSIDC DAAC)

Characteristic.Name: OrbitInclination
Characteristic.Description: Angle between the orbit plane and the Earth's equatorial plane

Characteristic.Name: ScanPeriod
Characteristic.Description: Time for AMSR-E to rotate about an axis parallel to local spacecraft vertical.

Characteristic.Name: SwathWidth
Characteristic.Description: The width of the sensor scan as the satellite moves along the ground track.

Characteristic.Name: ScanAngle
Characteristic.Description: The angle between the sensor view vector and the nadir axis

Characteristic.Name: OrbitInclination
Characteristic.Description: Angle between the orbit plane and the Earth's equatorial plane

Characteristic.Name: ScanPeriod
Characteristic.Description: Time for AMSR2 to rotate about an axis parallel to local spacecraft vertical.

Characteristic.Name: SwathWidth
Characteristic.Description: The width of the sensor scan as the satellite moves along the ground track.

Characteristic.Name: ScanAngle
Characteristic.Description: The angle between the sensor view vector and the nadir axis

AdditionalAttribute.Name: NominalPassIndex
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The nominal pass index number for the pass that best describes the spatial location of the granule, where the pass is either the ascending or descending portion of an orbit.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: StartingPolygonNumber
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The index number for the first polygon associated with the nominal pass number in the granule.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: EndingPolygonNumber
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The index number for the last polygon associated with the nominal pass number in the granule.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PercentLandData
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percentage of data points in the half-orbit data file that are done = (number of land points/total number of points)*100 (computed using an ocean mask).

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PercentRetrievals
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percentage of data points over land where retrievals are done = (number of retrieval points/total number of land points)*100 (computed using a classification mask for mountains, forest, etc.).

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PercentRetrievalsWithinBounds
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percentage of land data points where retrievals are done, whose retrievals are within bounds = (number of within-bounds retrieval points/number of retrieval points)*100.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: identifier_product_doi
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product

AdditionalAttribute.Name: identifier_product_doi_authority
AdditionalAttribute.Description: URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority

OnlineResource.Description: Data set documentation at the NASA NSIDC DAAC
